name: World of Warships: Legends — Small Treasure
name_original: World of Warships: Legends — Small Treasure
description:
Here's a small treasure haul to help you out in World of Warships: Legends! Equip your ships with these boosters and camos to enhance them in battle!

Includes: - 3 days of Premium Account - 10x Type 1 сamouflages - 10x Type 2 сamouflages - 15x common boosters of battle propensity - 5x rare boosters of battle propensity - 37,000 Commander XP
